Unassuming in appearance, these slippers indicate their nature only with a signature strip of yellow stitching. You gain a +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Activate 2 command, envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You move like the wind, with precision and speed. You Stride up to 120 feet; this movement doesn't trigger reactions. When you stop, if you've moved at least 30 feet from where you started, you release a thunderous @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] that deals @Damage[3d6[bludgeoning],3d6[sonic]]{3d6 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 sonic damage} with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34|basic:true]. A creature that critically fails its save is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].
